main event: A metallic craft was spotted moving rapidly along a ridge line near Colorado Springs, Colorado in 1954.
interesting points: The craft was partially visible, with only the lower half not visible.
The craft moved at extremely high speeds, with speeds ranging from 23 knots to 52 knots.
The sighting lasted for approximately 10 seconds.
The report includes radar data, with the craft detected at various headings and speeds.
The report concludes that the sighting was of an unknown object.
